nodes.text: Hado Gwin was a Twi'lek male who spent several years training at the Dette Lawnic Dance Academy with his partner Boshti Anilee. The couple then joined the competitive dancing circuit and won trophies in three sectors. The pair followed the yacht First Light—a vessel belonging to Dryden Vos, leader of the criminal Crimson Dawn—from port to port and in 10 BBY, he and Anilee were on board the yacht when it arrived on the planet Vandor and danced to a performance by singers Aurodia Ventafoli and Luleo Primoc.

Hado Gwin first appeared in the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story, and was first identified in the accompanying reference book Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
